column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Wow. Amazing. We had a great time there
column2: it was our second time dining. The food was great
column3: fresh and exotic at the same time. The bacon wrapped dates were out of this world
column4: along with the blue cheese beef and don't forget the fried green peppers!! The red sangria goes really well with the meal to bc its not too sweet at all! And the desserts are amazing
column5: the carmel cake is to die for! The tapas portions are perfeccct too!!
